Bénédict Cuenot bu onye French I injinia nke na ahụ maka ihe gbasara ngụkọta na nhazi ihe ndị metụtara ikike ikuku, nakwa etu ihe gbasara obi si aga mana ezukorita
Igwe omeputara bu ihe nke eji achọpụta maka ihe ndị na emebigasi ihe gbasara iku ume, ihe ndị na ewebata íshí ọjọọ, ihe gbasara petrolu , igwe combushon nakwa ihe ga akwusilata combushon.

Ọ bu Bénédict bu onye no na isi ma na ahụkwa ihe gbasara ngalaba na amu maka combushon ma mba iropuỌ na ahu maka ngalaba ndị na emezi ihe sayensị na Mba Toulouse nakwa mahadum nọ na Netherlands nke ama dika mahadum na amu maka teknoloji nakwa mekaniks.
Cuenot gụrụ injinia na École Centrale Paris, nweta nzere injinia ma nweta nzere masta na 1990

Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ doctorate na 1995, na thesis Étude asymptotique et numérique de la structure des flammes de diffusion laminaires et turbulentes [Asymptotic and numerical study of the structure of laminar and turbulent diffusion flames] nke Thierry Poinsot lekọtara na National Polytechnic Institute of Toulouse
Mgbe ọ ghọsịrị onye isi nke nyocha ọkụ na CERFACS, na 2021 ọ gbakwunyere njikọ nwa oge dị ka prọfesọ na Mahadum Teknụzụ nke Eindhoven,  ebe ọ na-esonyere otu Jeroen A
van Oijen na ngalaba injinia igwe

A họpụtara Cuenot na klas mbụ nke 2018 nke Fellows nke The Combustion Institute, "maka ọganihu magburu onwe ya na imepụta na imepụta ọkụ na-agbawa agbawa na gburugburu dị mgbagwoju anya, nke nwere ọtụtụ physics".
